text1: GMOs allow for an increase in crop yield.
text2: GMOs are unable to improve crop yield in many parts of the world.

text1: GMOs allow for an increase in crop yield.
text2: GMOs do not increase crop yield, rather they protect the existing yield.

text1: Just the fact that a crop has been genetically modified does not make it more allergenic than it was to begin with.
text2: GMOs might give you food allergies.

text1: People should always check for specific food allergies they might have before consuming any food item.
